document.full_text: dean foods co  is stepping up its efforts to cut expenses and plans to continue to raise prices, as the top u.s. dairy company battles higher commodity costs and weak demand at its core fresh dairy products business.
document.title: dean foods steps up cost cutting, plans more price hikes
lines_and_colors: dean foods co  is stepping up its efforts to cut expenses and plans to continue to raise prices, as the top u.s. dairy company battles higher commodity costs and weak demand at its core fresh dairy products business.
